name: Erin and the Otherworld
description:
Draw constellations to defeat Celtic monsters with powerful magic in this roguelike deckbuilder.

Theme

Inspired by recorded Celtic mythology. Play as a druidess and save your homeland from Celtic monsters.

Gameplay

  • Connect stars to create constellations
  • Power up rituals to attack and defend
  • Add rituals to your deck
  • Navigate event encounters
  • Procedurally generated star maps
  • Lose and start anew
  • Original art, story, and soundtracks
